Name: Oneiric Masterpieces - Paris
About the game: The Oneiric Collection is the new way to visit museum and architectures. In this chapter we invite you in one of the most beautiful Paris square : 'La Place Vendôme'. Here you'll find more than 20 masterpieces among the most beautifull you could find in Paris (The Venus de Milo, The Mona Lisa, The Winged victory of Samothrace... ) Move freely on the square and interact with all the masterpieces (scale and rotate them) use an audio guide or an info panel. Our 3D graphic technic will provide you the best experience with very realistic 3D models. Enjoy the most advanced VR museum visit experience ! We added some easter eggs. Will you be able to find them ?
